title: Applying for a Residence permit in Montenegro | AA Konsalting
description: Applying for a Residence permit in Montenegro
page-header-text: The endless mountains, the crystal clear waters of the Adriatic Sea, the gentle sun, the magical nature, the ancient towns steeped in the spirit of centuries-old history, the rivers of wine and divine delicacies - that's Montenegro.
page-header-text-2: We provide a wide range of services to make Montenegro your home too!

benefits.maintitle: Montenegro residence permit provide a lot of advantages, for example:
benefits.benefit-1: Possibility to stay permanently in the country - without going abroad
benefits.benefit-2: Opportunity not to pay tourist’ tax
benefits.benefit-3: Opportunity to open a bank account in Montenegro and buy a car
benefits.benefit-4: Simplified visa application: USA, Schengen, Great Britain
benefits.benefit-6: Opportunity get a permanent residence after 5 years, and then a Montenegrin passport after 10 years

service-1.subtitle: Оформление
service-1.panel-p: Подготовка документов и получение/продление ВНЖ по всем возможным вариантам в Черногории, в том числе:
panel-ul: Предоставление почтового адреса для физического лица;
Предоставление почтового адреса для юридического лица и адреса для фирмы;
Административное и правовое сопровождение процесса оформления ВНЖ.
